text: Ra yadi hamile tiniharuche'u pharistaharula'i (svargadutaharu) patha'idi'eko bha'e, ra mrtakaharule tiniharusamga kura garna thaleko bha'e, ra hamile tiniharuko agadi sansaraka sabai kura upasthita gara'idi'eko bha'e pani yiniharule imana lya'une thi'enan. Jabasam'ma allaha svayamle camhadain, tara uniharumadhye adhikansa ajnani chan
